name: Falsely Accused
description:
Name: Falsely Accused

Genre: Choose your own adventure

Rating: PG

Game Overview: You've been falsely accused of murder, and sent to prison with a life sentence. You can either chose to stay and accept your fate, or find some way to break out. Be careful what you pick, some results may result in you getting caught and having to restart.

Game Design Team: 

Kylie Dixon - Game designer
